snippet: Arizona’s rules on the use of abortion drugs are likely to be struck down and will continue to be blocked while a lawsuit against them plays out, a federal appeals court ruled Tuesday.
abstract: Federal appeals court rules that Arizona's rules on the use of abortion drugs are likely to be struck down and will continue to be blocked while a lawsuit against them plays out.
lead_paragraph: Arizona’s rules on the use of abortion drugs are likely to be struck down and will continue to be blocked while a lawsuit against them plays out, a federal appeals court ruled Tuesday.

headline.main: Arizona: Court Continues to Block Abortion Rules
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Court Continues to Block Abortion Rules
